extendedInfo.description: The Kingston Community News is the only news organization (in print and online) that is dedicated to covering Kingston, WA. And if *you* care about our community, you count on the Kingston Community News for local news, opinion, sports and coverage of the arts. Our app brings you everything from our site and more, including: - Our award-winning local and regional news - Send us your news photos or video right from your mobile phone - Sports - Entertainment - Business news - Opinions and letters to the editor - Local blogs - Weather - Traffic - Intuitive, patent-pending navigation - Easy news sharing by e-mail, text message and post to Twitter and Facebook - And moreâ¦ Today, with monthly print publication and daily online updates as part of Sound Publishing Inc., the Kingston Community News is committed to keeping 8,500 households - and, via the Internet, our many friends and family members abroad - up to date on this amazing Kitsap community around them. Annual special sections highlight local leaders and volunteers, women in business, scholars and athletes, and tourism destinations. If it happens in Kingston, we've got it covered. We care about our community, because you do too.
